entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
